title: Ellison Wonderland
description: Bluejay, 1984. Trade paperback. First published in 1962, this is a collection of the best of Ellison's early work. Contains a new introduction ("The Man On the Mushroom") written for this edition, and these "Commuter's Problem" (1957); "Do-It-Yourself" (1961, with Joe L. Hensley); "The Silver Corridor" (1956); "All the Sounds of Fear" (1962); "Gnomebody" (1956); "The Sky Is Burning" (1958); "Mealtime" (1958); "The Very Last Day of a Good Woman" (1958); "Battlefield" (1958); "Deal from the Bottom" (1960); "The Wind Beyond the Mountains" (1957); "Back to the Drawing Boards" (1958); "Nothing for My Noon Meal" (1958); "Hadj" (1956); "Rain, Rain, Go Away" (1956); "In Lonely Lands" (1959).
author: Harlan Ellison
